comments.body:
Nobody transitions their gender, they transition their BODY to FIT their gender.
Your sex is your body, and your gender is your brain.
You are not really surprised to learn that the brain is sexually dimorphic are you?
When so much of the rest of our bodies differ from male to female, of COURSE the brain would differ too.

Sometimes unfortunate birth defects happen, with some being more common then others, while something like being born with a "tail" is very rare, being born with a female brain and a male body (or vice versa) are a lot more common.

When your brain and body don't match, you suffer, and we don't have the tech to change the brain in such an extensive manner.
Changing the body is literally all we can do to relieve the suffering, giving us an actual chance at life and thus enabling us to contribute to society in return.
